alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:01PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Highlands, Hardee and DeSoto Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Arcadia, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sebring, Arcadia, Wauchula, Lake Placid, Sebring Regional Airport, Southeast Arcadia, Ona, Sylvan Shores, Lake Istokpoga, Venus, Sweetwater, Zolfo Springs, Nocatee, Limestone, Brownville, Lake Josephine, Archbold, Placid Lakes, Lorida and Gardner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
